snippet.title: Computershare sells Indian venture
snippet.content: Computershare has sold its 50% interest in its Indian venture, Karvy Computershare to General Atlantic. Computershare expects to realise post tax proceeds of US$90 million (A$113m) upon completion of the sale. Karvy Computershare's contribution to the Computershare Group's post tax earnings has been around 1.5% in recent periods. Computershare expects to book a post-tax accounting gain on sale of US$120 million subject to future changes in net assets and foreign exchange rates. Originally published as
